description: Serve this hearty chili at your Super Bowl Party, Sunday family gathering, or any night of the week when you need a healthy stick-to-your-ribs meal.
keywords: chili, vegan, black bean, corn, spicy super bowl, party
name: 30 Minute Black Bean Chili
recipeIngredient: 3 cubes Dorot Gardens Sauteed Glazed Onions
1-4oz can fire roasted diced green chilies
1-28 oz can fire roasted diced tomatoes ( see note 1)
For garnish: diced avocado, tomatoes, sliced jalape√±o peppers

recipeInstructions.text: Place a large soup pot on the stove over medium heat. Add the onions and cook for 2 minutes. Add the fire roasted chilies, and cook for another 2 minutes. Add the chili powder, oregano, cumin and salt and keep cooking for 2 more minutes
Add the diced tomatoes, black beans (one can rinse and drained and the other with the can water See note 2), corn and cilantro. Bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes
